content:
The excavator, which the invaders dug in Kharkiv region, were destroyed by the border guards of the Guard Brigade of the offensive "Steel Border".

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

As noted, while working in the Kharkiv direction, aerial reconnaissance of the Steel Border Offensive Guard brigade discovered an excavator of the occupiers during the arrangement of enemy positions.

This information was received by the brigade mortars and inflicted sighting of the 120th caliber mortar.

As reported by the Armyinform, Ukrainian ArtadestroyedAir Defense, UAV control station and Artzassibs.
title: Our mortars left the occupiers without an excavator with one shot
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. As noted, during work ...
author: Army Inform
